alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...GUSTY AND DRY THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ROOSEVELT AND SOUTH CENTRAL CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a couple gusty and dry thunderstorms near Portales and Cannon AFB, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and localized blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. A few cloud-to-ground lightning strikes possible. Blowing dust may significantly drop visibility in dust-prone locations. Locations impacted include... Portales, Floyd, Arch, Cannon Air Force Base, Oasis State Park and Portair. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 378 and 384. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
